程序包 representation

类 ImageNode

java.lang.Object
representation.Node
representation.NodeDecorator
representation.ImageNode
所有已实现的接口:
Event
public class ImageNode extends NodeDecorator
A decorator class that adds an image feature to nodes. It wraps around a standard node and associates an image with it, which can be displayed in a GameFrame.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    ImageNode(Node wrappedNode, String imagePath, GameFrame gameFrame)
    Constructs an ImageNode that wraps around an existing node, adding image capabilities.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    display()
    Displays the node's content and updates the GameFrame's background with the node's image.
    ImageIcon
    getImage()
    Gets the image associated with this node.

    从类继承的方法 representation.NodeDecorator

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ImageNode

      public ImageNode(Node wrappedNode, String imagePath, GameFrame gameFrame)
      Constructs an ImageNode that wraps around an existing node, adding image capabilities.
      参数:
      wrappedNode - The node to be wrapped by this ImageNode.
      imagePath - The path to the image file to be displayed for this node.
      gameFrame - The game frame where the image is to be displayed.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getImage

      public ImageIcon getImage()
      Gets the image associated with this node.
      返回:
      The ImageIcon associated with this node.

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the node's content and updates the GameFrame's background with the node's image.
      指定者:
      display 在接口中 Event
      覆盖:
      display 在类中 NodeDecorator
